[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@yext/answers-core](./answers-core.md) &gt; [HighlightedFields](./answers-core.highlightedfields.md)

## HighlightedFields interface

A mapping of the values emphasized by the Answers API.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface HighlightedFields 
```

## Example 1

If a user searches for 'pet' and a description field in the results contains the value 'A pet store', the API will likely match the word 'pet'.

## Example 2


```js
{
  name: {
    value: 'Yext',
    matchedSubstrings: [{ offset: 0, length: 4}]
  },
  c_food: [
    {
      fruits: [
      {
        value: 'apple',
        matchedSubstrings: []
      },
      {
        value: 'pear',
        matchedSubstrings: []
      }
    }
  ]
}

```
